title: Unleashing AI: Trump’s Vision For American Tech Dominance

title: From Scribes To Cyborgs: Managing Knowledge Across Eras

title: The AGI Final Frontier: The CLJ-AGI Benchmark

title: Stop Pretending LLMs Have Feelings Media's Dangerous AI Anthropomorphism Problem
content_snippet: When AI causes harm, headlines blame the bot instead of the billion-dollar companies that built them. This anthropomorphic coverage is tech journalism at its worst.

title: Swiss AI For Public Good: A ProSocial AI Blueprint For The World?

title: Backlash to Delta's AI pricing shows the tightrope companies walk when it comes to AI

title: ChatGPT advises women to ask for lower salaries, finds new study

title: I'm a teacher who has integrated AI and ChatGPT into my classroom. It saves me time and helps me be a more efficient educator.

title: Hiding secret codes in light protects against fake videos
content_snippet: A team of Cornell computer science researchers has developed a way to “watermark” light in videos, which they can use to detect if video is fake or has been manipulated, another potential tool in the fight against misinformation.
